segments.text: I can't believe you wear jeans to the office ! Are you trying to lose your job ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course not . I'm just observing casual day . On Fridays , the company doesn't require us to wear formal business attire .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Wow ! Nobody told me about that . Won't the relaxed dress code damage the company image ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We don't think so . Casual days are becoming more common , and we believe employees can maintain a professional image without wearing uncomfortable clothes .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I guess it lets people express their individual tastes . But won't some people abuse it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not really . Besides , there is a separate dress code for casual day . People can't just wear whatever they want .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It seems that a relaxed atmosphere could hinder productivity .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Believe it or not , it has the opposite effect . Employees are actually more productive on casual days .
segments.speaker: S2
